title: Online price changes for high-demand products
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: The online price changes of selected high demand products (HDP) dataset. These data are experimental estimates developed to deliver timely indicators to help understand the impact of COVID-19.
datasetNotes: On landing page under your download option

Product.description: These products were chosen at the beginning of lockdown using anecdotal evidence on which products were in high demand from consumers.

sizingNotes: 2 simple tables with footnotes on 1 tab
notes:
This dataset now been replaced with an expanded set of indices, published for the first time on 10 September 2020. DM (Leigh) has moved dataset in Github into "Done".
More information about the replacement dataset can be found on website: https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/healthandsocialcare/conditionsanddiseases/methodologies/onlineweeklypricechangesmethodology
